subtitle: Great action is taking place to improve diversity in books and dolls and there are a number of different vendors making it easier to find these great items. You're want to encourage their creativity, what images are in their colouring books? You're throwing a birthday party, what are your options?
moreInfo: The list can go on and on. It is an unnecessarily complicated task to source and purchase everyday lifestyle products for children that have black images. These companies exist but one must be internet savvy and social media literate to find them. KIDS SWAG was launched in December 2016 to make it easy for parents to build environments that are reflective of their child's beauty.
